title: "EchoSpeech: Revolutionizing Communication with Silent-Speech Recognition Technology"
excerpt: "Researchers at Cornell University have developed EchoSpeech, a silent-speech recognition interface that employs acoustic-sensing and artificial intelligence to continuously recognize up to 31 unvocalized commands based on lip and mouth movements."
